statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, account_balance FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_email, transaction_date FROM customers WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT AVG(account_balance) AS average_balance, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' AND amount >= 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, phone_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, phone_number HAVING total_amount < 3000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age >= 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age <= 25
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, transaction_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, report_content FROM customers LEFT JOIN reports ON customers.customer_id = reports.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, report_type FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts INNER JOIN customers ON accounts.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT DISTINCT report_type FROM reports
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate, status FROM loans WHERE interest_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT full_name, email, address FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loans.status = 'pending';
